page.title: 17MEDIA IN M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: The Market Weighton and Shiptonthorpe area, like the rest of Britain, is served well by the BBC and Independent local radio. The most popular stations are "Radio One", "Radio Humberside" and "Viking Radio". Television proves the most popular media source for most people, most homes having at least 1 T.V. The local papers are the "Pocklington Times", "The Hull Daily Mail", "The Evening Press" and the "Yorkshire Post", as well as the national papers. Papers are distributed by the newsagents of Market Weighton using young delivery persons. As for media coverage the area is very quiet and so does not merit even a permanent local paper reporter.
